justification: Analyzed package stability (Ca=1, Ce=4, S=0.2) is lower than all its outgoing dependencies: org.apache.commons.lang3 (S=0.565), org.apache.commons.lang3.function (S=0.778), org.apache.commons.lang3.math (S=0.75), org.apache.commons.lang3.exception (S=0.833). The package depends only on more stable components.

The package has instability (I) = 0.5, calculated as Ce/(Ce+Ca) = 2/(2+2). Its outgoing dependencies are to packages with lower instability values: 'org.apache.commons.lang3' (I ≈ 0.4348) and 'org.apache.commons.lang3.function' (I ≈ 0.2222). Since the package depends only on packages that are more stable (lower I), the Stable Dependencies Principle is not violated.
